page.shortlink: api a5 is runtime plus function

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Indicates the application is based on Alpha Anywhere Runtime Plus. .F. = Indicates the application is not using Runtime Plus.

page.description: The A5_IS_RUNTIMEPLUS() function indicates whether the running application is based on Alpha Anywhere Runtime Plus. Returns .t. if the Runtime version is the 'Plus' edition
